message: Let's be fair and reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor, Alice. How about a slightly more balanced split this time?
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more. How about 57-43?
Alice, this is getting us nowhere.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit before inflation eats away at the value.
